meta.title: Skyesoft Rebuild Roadmap
meta.description: Canonical execution roadmap aligned with Codex v1.1.0 governance, SSE-first architecture, governed AI workflows, SQL migration, Document Engine consolidation, and the System Initialization Standard (SIS). This roadmap represents the authoritative planning state for the Skyesoft rebuild.

phases.name: Codex + Sovereignty Foundation
tasks: Codex upgraded to v1.1.0 with Meta, Constitution, Tier-2 Standards, and Tier-3 Modules
Document Engine created; legacy individual document modules removed
Repository Standard ratified (canonical directory structure, camelCase enforcement)
Semantic Responder Standard approved
RAG Framework Standard approved
AI Integration Standard approved
Skyebot constitutional prompt schema created (semantic, RAG-aware, SSE-aware)
Parliamentarian Review logic created and embedded into askOpenAI.php
Deployment sovereignty reaffirmed: Skyesoft operates solely on skyelighting.com (GoDaddy)
Codex Page Registry framework approved (all UI pages must be registered)
phases.output: Codex v1.1.0 finalized — the system’s constitutional and sovereignty foundations are complete

phases.name: Repository and Core Governance Alignment
tasks: Finalize auditor implementation for criticalArtifactPresence violations using governed artifact requirements
Finalize auditor implementation for jurisdictionalRuleConformance based on authoritative jurisdiction sources
Define structured facts schemas for criticalArtifactPresence violations
Define structured facts schemas for jurisdictionalRuleConformance violations
Implement Sentinel handling for new violation classes with deterministic identityHash derivation
Implement Mutator handling rules for criticalArtifactPresence (advisory or humanRequired only)
Implement Mutator handling rules for jurisdictionalRuleConformance (humanRequired only)
Register criticalArtifactPresence and jurisdictionalRuleConformance in violationClasses registry
Validate end-to-end detection → record → re-audit behavior for new violation classes
Confirm no UI, SSE, or state mutation occurs as part of these validations
phases.output: Core governance violation classes implemented, registered, and validated with deterministic detection and controlled reconciliation behavior

phases.name: Live SSE and Operational Dashboard Integration
tasks: Deploy the production Server-Sent Events (SSE) stream with full Tier-2 Codex compliance
Enforce exclusive SSE sourcing for dashboard state: time, weather, holiday status, TIS phase, and versionContext
Validate Time Interval Standards (TIS) transitions using holidayRegistry.json and SSE-provided day-of-week
Verify weather update cadence and caching behavior in accordance with operationalConfig rules
Implement stale-signal detection and user-visible warnings for SSE delays exceeding 5 seconds
Enable sseIntegrityChecker.php to continuously validate SSE health, schema, and payload integrity
Validate officeBoard.html under live SSE conditions with zero console errors and consistent rendering
phases.output: Office Board operates as a fully real-time, SSE-driven operational dashboard governed by Codex standards

phases.name: Governance Enforcement Loop Activation
tasks: Finalize violationClasses registry with complete schemas, categories, and narrative guidance
Ensure Auditor emits violations using only structured facts (no inferred data)
Confirm Sentinel produces deterministic violation batches with stable identityHash derivation
Validate Merkle integrity detection using governed Codex artifacts and observed state only
Validate repository inventory conformance against governed inventory manifest
Ensure Mutator performs only governed corrective actions (no silent state mutation)
Enforce invariant checks preventing spurious or duplicate resolutions
Record resolution metadata with verifiable before/after facts and timestamps
Integrate AI-assisted resolution narratives using governed prompts only
Confirm all resolved violations remain historically immutable in auditResults.json
Validate full loop: detect → record → reconcile → resolve → re-audit
phases.output: Auditor, Sentinel, and Mutator operate as a closed governance loop with deterministic detection, controlled reconciliation, and verifiable resolution records

phases.name: Human Decision Surface & Governed Intervention UI
tasks: Define resolutionModes per violationClass (automated | humanRequired | advisory)
Extend violation schema to flag humanDecisionRequired states
Design governed decision prompts for non-automatable violations
Implement Mutator pause behavior when human approval is required
Create Index page UI for reviewing active violations and resolution context
Display violation facts, impact scope, and governed options without remediation bias
Allow authorized human actor to approve, reject, defer, or escalate a resolution
Record human decisions as immutable resolution events with actor attribution
Ensure rejected resolutions do not mutate governed state
Integrate decision outcomes back into auditResults.json without overwriting history
Validate governance authority boundaries (developer vs system vs AI)
Confirm full traceability from violation → decision → outcome
phases.output: A governed human-in-the-loop interface enabling authoritative decisions without compromising Codex integrity or audit traceability

phases.name: Skyebot Contact Intake (Semantic & RAG-driven)
tasks: Skyebot parses email signatures and user prompts into structured contact data
Enforce Prefix Registry for ENT-, LOC-, and CNT- identifiers
Prevent duplication of entity, location, or contact records based on Codex rules
Store new contacts in JSON interim database until SQL migration
Integrate RAG retrieval from Codex and skyesoft-data.json for context alignment
Use Document Engine to generate contact confirmation documents when applicable
Ensure Parliamentarian validates all write-side actions before allowing storage
phases.output: AI-powered semantic contact creation with prefix-controlled identity management

phases.name: Database Migration (JSON → SQL)
tasks: Design SQLite schema for entities, locations, contacts, permits, and documents
Include entity type definitions: company, jurisdiction, client, vendor
Enforce referential integrity for all links: entity → location → contact
Migrate JSON records into SQL in canonical order: entities → locations → contacts → documents
Define SQL-based lineage tracking for Document Engine outputs
Update officeBoard and backend modules to read SQL instead of JSON for metrics
Validate database as the unified SOT for structured data
phases.output: Unified relational Skyesoft data layer with strict referential integrity

phases.name: Document Engine Activation
tasks: Activate Document Engine as the single module for all document types
Implement render pipeline for HTML/PDF creation using Tier-2 Document Standards
Bind Document Catalog entries: permitFeeReport, photoSurvey, workOrderRequest, etc.
Add document lineage indexing into documentIndex.json and SQL
Restore floating header/footer and spacing doctrine for all documents
Migrate any legacy templates into Codex-aligned templates
Confirm documents follow icon rules, spacing rules, and section semantics
phases.output: Professional-grade, Codex-governed document automation via one unified engine

phases.name: System Initialization Standard (SIS)
tasks: Prepare clean environment for first launch (remove test and legacy JSON data)
Initialize mandatory SOT files: errorRegistry.json, repositoryAudit.json, versions.json
Run initial Merkle Integrity Sequence (MIS): merkleBuild → merkleVerify
Execute zero-state repositoryAuditor.php to confirm structural compliance
Initialize SSE system: getDynamicData.php, getVersions.php, sse.php health check
Register all active UI pages in pageRegistry.json
Run Skyebot initialization routine (Parliamentarian, prompt engine, RAG layer)
Generate System Initialization Certificate (SIC) stored under codex/meta/
phases.output: Skyesoft enters canonical operational state with clean data, verified SOT, validated structure, and initialized live systems

summaryTimeline.result: Governance violation detection and reconciliation operational
Auditor, Sentinel, and Mutator governance loop active
AI-driven contact intake and automation active
SQL backbone ensures long-term structured data integrity
System Initialization Standard complete; Skyesoft enters production readiness
